title: SAMSUNG Crystal 4K 108 cm (43 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart TV  (UA43AUE60AKLXL)

product_specification.In The Box: 1N LED TV, 1N POWER CORD, 2N BATTERY -ALKALINE (AAA SIZE), 1N REMOCON, 1N STAND - LEFT, 1N STAND - RIGHT
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Product Warranty and 1 Year Additional on Panel
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear and Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV.The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost.The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features.The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settingsQuick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Crystal 4K Resolution: This TV delivers crisp, detailed, and sharp visuals to make your viewing experience impressive and exciting.
product_description.PurColor: This technology unveils a wide range of shades to ensure optimal picture performance and to offer an immersive entertainment experience.

review:
Very impressive picture quality .Good color balance and video presets are available unlike some tv's where colors are more defined for watching soaps and reality shows(by default). Connectivity is great. Connets to 2.5 as well as 5ghz wifi band . Remote operation is intuitive. Software experience is good. There is no voice asistance ( only available in pro i think) but its not a deal breaker for me.
The hdfc cashbacks and flipkart plus discounts makes it a very lucrative deal.
Sound is overall good but at some points feels like voice could have been crispier. Overall a good buy for cinematic experience.

Picture - 10/10
Sound - 9/10
Connectivity - 9/10
Guys please go for voice assistant enabled tv otherwise you will have to press lot more buttons than usual and that is a big problem . Rest everything is great as expected. The picture is great , sound is good for 120 sq ft room . All features are user friendly and operates with ease.
It's a very good product. Working fine with great picture quality. Sound is good with only 20W speakers.

Happy to see “made in india”on the box, yes this is completly made in india. TV is very good, we can see the clear difference with ordinary tv when 4k video is played, sound is clear and loud. Delivery and installation is very fast and completed on time. Dont purchase cheap china tvs which are available at less price. Encourage made in india products. The tizen os is very fast and lag free. The booting time is very less and i love the ui.
Excellent product. Excellent delivery & installation. You just need a good internet connection to enjoy this television. One of the best in the category.

All good. But one thing. Improve the sound quality. Thats nit upto the mark. Good delivery by flipcart. East installation on the same day. Picture quality superb. Just unsatisfied with sound quality. Samsung need to work if they have to survive.
Budget 4K ULtra smart LED in this Timely delivered and free installed.
Best in this price range. Amazing picture quality. Audio is also good (better with a sound bar). Awesome build quality. Highly recommended.

Incredible product. The same series casts more than 60k in retail stores, so make sure you buy this one online.
The packaging for good and the installation was very quick. Got this product on 21st June and the installation happened the very next day.

Great picture and sound quality.

Overall I am super satisfied after spending this much money

Must buy for those who want a 50 inch plus TV

It's been more than 6 months I've been using this tv now.
Picture quality and sound are great for this price
The regular apps we use in smart TV are all available
The OS is good and fast initially but it started slowing down recently.
Initially it used to take 5 sec to startup but it gradually increased.

Great deal, I am satisfied with this Product. Purchased after a research, Sony is much Expensive. Sorted Lg, Mi, vu. Finally selected the latest one from Samsung. Only disappointment is low quality plastic at back side, but its trifling.
If wall mounted connectivity become difficult. We can watch some online content on Samsung TV Plus

Picture - Good even at 480 p (YouTube) 9/10
Sound - 9/10
Remote 8/10
Wifi 10/10

I want to thank Flipkart for seamless TV exchange experience. This is very different from the earlier impression while exchanging old product on Flipkart had challenges. Good improvement in this aspect, looks like Flipkart has taken people's feedback positively on exchange policy. My only little complain from Flipkart is the technician who came to install the TV didn't had good knowledge of TV function.
Pros:
Samsung crystal UHD TV picture quality is really outstanding. Liked the picture upscaling of SD content to HD. It gets closer to Sony picture quality. Easy to navigate to OTT platform on Tizen OS. Sound quality is good. Samsung plus enables free streaming for few channels like Republic, Bloomberg don't need dth connection for those channels.
Cons:
Hotstar is not streaming at 4k content don't know why Samsung has kept it aside. Hope Samsung would fix this issue by software update. 3.5 mm audio jack missing. Free storage space is only 2 GB.

Overall satisfactory experience so far.

It is an awesome tv with superb picture quality and amazing details.SOUND could have been better but considering all other Chinese brands' picture quality, this is a heavenly good tv!!!!
Also not to mention the service experience it was very good!!!!!

I had to choose between samsung and other brands like LG, Kodak, Vu. Ultimately went with samsung for peace of mind. Picture and sound quality is great. With a good internet connection, the picture quality is amazing and connectivity is not an issue barring the need to end the app in ipad and restart to airdrop the content. Use smart things to connect your tv to google home and use your mobile as remote. The 43 inch tv makes it easier to use it from my bedroom too. Loving it
Super quality awesome experience best quality TV Samsung I love it

The tv has very good picture quality and good colour reproduction but the ving angle as not so good compared to my previous LG TV. It's also really good for gaming using console. Sound is also decent if you toggle some setting you can amplify the audio.I didn't feel any lag issue it's running smoothly.

Good TV in all respect but only one think missing that is Legacy support for AV connectivity with cables for old system which dont have HDMI. Wall mount is not provided in box but is provided free during installation.
Picture 10/10
Sound 7/ 10 Bass could be better at this price range.
Durability 9/10
Applications 8/10 No customizable homescreen. But its good by default.
Connectivity 7/10 as no AV input is provided and if you dont have HDMI then have to buy a converter.
User interface : 8/10

Outstanding TV go for it ..many AAP's is not supported only issue superb picture quality just awesome... After using it 2 months i realise that tv picture quality is superb at this price but one thing I regret the most is tyzen processor which makes the tv very slow , tyzen processor not fast like android tv ,, it took much more time ro open apps or anything than android tv , so I use a mi android box with this tv tyzen processor is disgusting but picture quality at this price is mind blowing

Nice tv and with VA panel but clearlity is good and side view also good ......but if u have old box of tata sky and it have no hdmi port soo u need to purchase it and then u connect ur tata sky box with this tv and used it .....
Awesome tv and good delevery service by ekart.. installation Engineer was also a nice and helpful person ..I bought it 29400 ... thanks alot filpkart

The TV was delivered and installed in 1 day which is unheard of. The installation and demo was extremely smooth!!

TV Pros

- Anything above 1080p, especially 4k quality is brilliant (content on YouTube and Netflix)
- Sound is decent. Would need a soundbar if you want more bass.
- Booting time is non existent. Changing picture settings and seeing how it looks real time is helpful
- Did see some motion blur/lag effect while watching football. This is easily fixed by lowering "Juddering" Under picture settings

Cons

- Couldn't see any 4k content on Prime video. Not sure if this an issue on prime or Samsung TV in general.
- If the picture quality is set to "Dynamic", the white balance is slightly blown. Can be fixed as well.

Tv is good, u should go for upper variant with voice search support remote.
My panel got some black spots after 6 months so I contacted samsung service center they replaced my complete pannel at my home.
All together good one.

picture quality is the basic necessity for a tv for which this product does a complete justice. so go for it blindly for picture quality. The motion smoothing effect is awesome and main highlight which comes in high budget tv's, so it is no less than it. completly happy with the purchase hope it will work for atleast 5 years
Awesome product
Best experience.. thanx to Flipkart for early delivery and fast installation
After unboxing within 1 hour display gone. Bad experience with Samsung.

Fantastic product. Great delivery. Flipkart guys opened the box in front of me before accepting the order. Samsung guys turned up on the same day as well. TV in itself is brilliant. Smart features are lovely for OTT. No issues with sound as well. Not sure why people are complaining about it.
2 things though. The stand needs to be of better quality and heavier. Secondly there has to be more space to install more OTT. Otherwise the TV is fantastic and must buy.

Value for money

Loved the picture quality but the TV is missing on few very basic features.

1. Since it is not an android TV, one doesn't have option of downloading apps from Google play store.

2. Samsung has its own operating system - Tizen which leaves a user with very limited options of downloading external apps. Samsung store has limited apps, it even does not have the basic apps listed there.

3. This model doesn't have Google Voice assistant support, with this model Samsung should have given that atleast.

4. Sound quality is also compromised, 20 watts speaker doesn't do justice and lacks power.

Other than the picture quality, it doesn't impress much. MI,LG, OnePlus are offering a bouquet of features at this price.
